description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9v1b2","text":"Protocol for SAPAP3 KO Mouse Model Genotyping from Dr. Lisa Gunaydin's Lab, University of California, San Francisco","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fv8g8","text":"Cut the tails. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bl0mc","text":"To cut the tails and mark the animals, keep in mind to:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fvpsk","text":"● cut as little amount of the tail as possible;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4l3p","text":"● always clean the scissors properly in between animals (EtOH and bleach);","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7tio2","text":"● tattoo the animals at the same time as cutting the tails;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eie2k","text":"● use iso if needed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9upil","text":"Digest the tails.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4bk9l","text":"Incubate the tails O/N at 55 C (water bath) in 200 ul 1x PBND buffer with Proteinase K at 0.25 mg/ml. Vortex before.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cn94a","text":"200ul * (54+1) = 11000ul --\u003e 11ml PBND","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":38}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7hhg","text":"0.25mg/ml * 11ml = 2.75mg --\u003e 0.00275g Proteinase K","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":51}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jbs","text":"PBND (250 ml 1x, stored at 4 C)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9l4p","text":"2.5 ml 1M TrisHCl pH 8.3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"28b06","text":"1.125 ml IGEPAL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3gnjk","text":"1.125 ml Tween 20","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e3n1p","text":"0.935 g KCl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dm4kk","text":"0.125 g MgCl2.6H20","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9bj1p","text":"0.025 g Gelatin","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"948fl","text":"Fill remainder with H2O","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5hf8a","text":"*Gelatin will dissolve only after heated","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d8j9i","text":"Inactivate Proteinase K.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7b53n","text":"After taking the tails out of the bath, see if they are digested. If so, vortex and boil them for 10 min. Vortex again and centrifuge at max speed for 5 min (table top centrifuge, something like 14,000 rpm).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3aek4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1olg2","text":"Run the 1% agarose gel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4540","text":"200 ml TAE","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8h9tm","text":"2g agarose","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a6l1m","text":"2ul sybr safe gel stain","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5lhdu","text":"24ul DNA per well. 5ul DNA ladder before each new line","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9i770","text":"PCR reaction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2k51k","text":"We use the KAPABiosystems HotStart ReadyMix (2x) which contains DNA Polymerase, rxn buffer, dNTPs and MgCl2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eio3m","text":"Pipette 24 ul of Master Mix into each PCR tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"636tb","text":"Add 1 ul of DNA from each sample into each tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"as2h2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"oi6n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69ss6","text":"Sap3 KO F1, Forward primer, 5' - 3': ATTGGTAGGCAATACCAACAGG ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5b4ro","text":"Sap3 KO R1, Reverse Primer 5' - 3': GCAAAGGCTCTTCATATTGTTGG ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1lloh","text":"Extra Primer, TKF2: CTTTGTGGTTCTAAGTACTGTGG","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fp8nb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"19m44","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jk3g","text":"1 rxnMM SAPAP (34 rxns)Primer nameTotal RxnsForward primer134Sap3 KO F134Reverse primer134Sap3 KO R1Extra primer134TKF2Rxn mix12.5425H208.5289DNA 1.0  PCR programSap3","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":166}],"data":{}},{"key":"auvkh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d70b8","text":"PCR Program for SAPAP3 Genotyping: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"do40f","text":"1. 95C for 4 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3gf1b","text":"2. 30 times: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3gkbq","text":"    94C for 30 seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7vd3m","text":"    62C for 30 seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"94a55","text":"    72C for 60 seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ij22","text":"3. 72C for 5 minutes ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4k01d","text":"4. 4C hold","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"el4rl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evtdc","text":"Expected band lengths: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c2tuu","text":"WT: one band at ~147 bp","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8t0m0","text":"Het: one band at ~147 bp and one band at ~222 bp","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a2hm7","text":"KO: one band at ~222 bp
